summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated Pediatrics to Go application with new Blood Gas Analysis and Electrolytes Calculator features. All functionality working correctly including landing page, new dialogs, NICU calculator navigation, and theme toggle.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (/api/, /api/status, /api/blood-gas/analyze) - all working correctly
Blood gas analysis API correctly identifies metabolic acidosis and lactic acidosis
Anion gap calculation working (16.0 for test values)
Landing page loads with 'Pediatrics to Go' title
NICU and Children cards displayed with proper styling and rounded corners
Children card shows 'Coming Soon' badge and is properly disabled
NICU card navigates correctly to /nicu route
Bottom navigation bar visible with all 5 icons (Blood Gas, Electrolytes, 3 future features)
Future navigation buttons properly disabled with 'Coming' labels
Theme toggle works on both landing and calculator pages
Blood Gas Dialog opens with correct title 'Blood Gas Analysis'
Two tabs present: AI Analysis and Manual Entry
AI tab contains Camera and Gallery buttons
Manual Entry tab shows all required input fields (pH, pCO2, pO2, HCO3, BE, Na, K, Cl, Lactate, Albumin)
Blood gas analysis with metabolic acidosis values works correctly
Results correctly show 'Metabolic Acidosis' and 'Lactic Acidosis Detected'
Anion Gap calculation displays correctly (16.0)
Reset button clears all form fields
Electrolytes Dialog opens with correct title 'Electrolytes Calculator'
Weight and Patient Type inputs visible and functional
All 6 tabs present: Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, NaHCO3, Phosphate, Infusions
Calcium calculation with 3.5kg weight correctly shows 3.5 ml dose
NaHCO3 tab shows correction formulas
Infusions tab shows all 6 drug buttons (MgSO4, Addiphos, Ca Gluconate, Ca Chloride, KCL, SodaBicarb)
Drug information displays correctly when buttons clicked
NICU Calculator functionality preserved and working
Back button navigation from calculator to landing page works
Round-trip navigation between landing and calculator works
All dialogs can be opened and closed properly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All 4 API endpoints working correctly including new blood gas analysis
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components, new dialogs, navigation, calculations, and integrations working correctly
